house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1981 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include master bedroom. Features include private pool, patio, fireplace, air conditioning.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s), Dining/Living Combo,Dishwasher, Garage Door Opener, Great Room, Microwave, Pantry
